description: Modifies the details of the specified user. You cannot update the userId for a user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the user that you want to update.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The option to indicate the type of user. SUPER_USER--- A user with permission to all the functionality and data in FinSpace. APP_USER --- A user with specific permissions in FinSpace. The users are assigned permissions by adding them to a permission group.

parameters.name: apiAccess
parameters.description: The option to indicate whether the user can use the GetProgrammaticAccessCredentials API to obtain credentials that can then be used to access other FinSpace Data API operations. ENABLED --- The user has permissions to use the APIs. DISABLED --- The user does not have permissions to use any APIs.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the updated user.
